name: Flexible Housing | Fall-Semester | CoLiving | 2C
neighborhood_overview: Fort Hill is a quiet neighborhood, perfect for long-term stays. There is a combination of families, medical professionals, and graduate students that coincide with a wonderful local history to build a strong culture in the local area. 139 Marcella is located in Highland Park within walking distance of the vibrant South End. The Jackson Square T-Stop is a 7 min walk and the Columbus Ave & Centre Street MBTA Bus Line (#22) is a 5 min walk. Within 20 min you can be in downtown Boston.
description:
If you are looking for flexibility, ease and affordability with all the uncertainty of COVID this Fall and Winter then look no further.

Thatch's Co-Living and furnished monthly rentals are tailor-made for this. Why commit to a 1 year lease, pay to move, pay a broker, buy furniture and spend precious time moving and getting settled if you aren't sure whether you'll be here for a year or not?

With Thatch you pick the perfect place and commit only to the dates you need. Let us do the rest!

The space
The kitchen is fully-equipped with appliances, including refrigerator, range with oven, microwave, pots/pans and cooking utensils. In the living room, there is a flat screen Smart TV and a comfortable sofa. The kitchen has a breakfast bar area that has room for four, and a bistro table for two.
